app.title: BingeList
app.description: Your ultimate platform to discover, track, and binge-watch thousands of TV shows

home.title: BingeList
home.subtitle: Your ultimate platform to discover, track, and binge-watch TV shows
home.noShowsMessage: Try refreshing the page or check back later.

search.title: Search TV Shows
search.searchByName: Search for TV shows by name...
search.resultsFor: Found {count} result for "{query}" | Found {count} results for "{query}"
search.noResultsMessage: Try searching with different keywords or check your spelling.
search.startSearchingMessage: Enter a TV show name to search through our extensive database.

show.notFoundMessage: The show you're looking for doesn't exist.

home.title: BingeList - Discover & Track Thousands of TV Shows
home.description: Your ultimate TV show discovery platform. Explore thousands of shows, create your watchlist, and never miss your next binge-worthy series!
home.keywords: tv shows, binge watch, series, watchlist, entertainment, streaming

search.title: Search TV Shows - BingeList
search.description: Search through thousands of TV shows. Find your next favorite series and add it to your watchlist.
search.keywords: search tv shows, find series, tv show search, binge list

genre.title: {genre} TV Shows - BingeList
genre.description: Discover the best {genre} TV shows. Browse our curated collection and find your next binge-worthy series.
genre.keywords: {genre}, tv shows, series, binge watch, entertainment

show.title: {name} - BingeList
show.fallbackDescription: Add {name} to your watchlist and discover more amazing TV shows on BingeList

watchlist.title: My Watchlist
watchlist.emptyMessage: Start adding shows to your watchlist to keep track of what you want to watch.
watchlist.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear your entire watchlist?

pwa.installDescription: Install BingeList for the best experience. Track shows offline and discover faster!

roadmap.title: AI Vision & Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Exploring the future of intelligent TV show discovery and personalization
roadmap.aiVisionDescription: Our vision is to create the most intelligent and personalized TV show discovery platform, powered by cutting-edge AI technology. Here's what we're working on.
roadmap.privacyPoint1: All AI recommendations run on aggregated, anonymized data
roadmap.privacyPoint2: Your watchlist and preferences stay local on your device
roadmap.privacyPoint3: No personal data is sold or shared with third parties
roadmap.privacyPoint4: You're always in control of your data and can opt-out anytime

current.smartSearchDesc: Fast, multilingual search across thousands of TV shows with real-time results
current.watchlistDesc: Track your favorite shows, mark episodes as watched, and never lose your progress
current.multilingualDesc: Full internationalization with English and Dutch language support
current.episodeTrackingDesc: Track watched episodes, view season progress, and manage your binge-watching

ai.personalizedRecsDesc: AI-powered show recommendations based on your viewing history and preferences
ai.personalizedRecs2: Discover shows similar to your favorites
ai.smartNotificationsDesc: Intelligent alerts for new episodes, season premieres, and shows you might like
ai.smartNotifications1: New episode alerts for watchlist shows
ai.contentDiscoveryDesc: Natural language search and semantic understanding of your preferences
ai.contentDiscovery1: Search by mood, theme, or vibe
ai.contentDiscovery2: Find shows based on plot descriptions
ai.contentDiscovery3: Discover hidden gems matching your taste
ai.aiChatbotDesc: Talk to our AI to find the perfect show for any mood or occasion
ai.aiChatbot3: Help you decide what to watch next
ai.predictiveWatchingDesc: AI learns when and what you prefer to watch, optimizing your experience
ai.predictiveWatching1: Predict when you'll finish a series
ai.socialIntegrationDesc: Connect with friends and discover shows together with AI matchmaking

footer.tagline: Your ultimate platform to discover, track, and binge-watch TV shows
